	<div class="carouseltitle">My Doctor is Board Certified. Is Yours?</div>

<a name="1076"></a><div id="dnn_ctr1076_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_1076 --><div id="dnn_ctr1076_ModuleContent" class="ModCodingStaffCarouselC">
	
<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(function () { initializeCSCarousel('1076', '/DesktopModules/CodingStaff.Carousel/', 'dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_btnLeft', 'dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_btnRight') });
</script>
<div style="width: 503px;">
    <div style="margin: 0px; width: 100%; float: left; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">
        <p id="topText_1076" />
    </div>
    <div style="width: 100%; float: left;">
        <div style="width: 31px; height: 100px; float: left">
            <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_btnLeft" class="btn left"></div>
        </div>
        <div id="featureCarousel_1076" class="featureCarousel" style="float: left">
            
                    
                    <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl0_dvFeature" class="feature" style="overflow: hidden" fileurl="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-03.jpg">
                        <div style="position: absolute;">
                            <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl0_dvVideoContainer" class="videoContainer">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <p id="topTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouseltop&quot;&gt;
&lt;p&gt;You want quality care for your family. That&amp;rsquo;s why choosing &lt;br /&gt;
a Board Certified doctor is so important.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <p id="bottomTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouselbottom&quot;&gt;Board Certification is a voluntary process that goes above and beyond licensing &lt;br /&gt;
requirements &amp;ndash; it's a commitment to continually expand knowledge in a medical specialty.&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carousellink&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/in-the-news/study-supports-benefit-of-certification.aspx&quot;&gt;Learn more &amp;gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carouselfooter&quot;&gt;Certification Matters&amp;trade;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <img id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl0_imgItem" class="imageItem" src="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-03.jpg" border="0" />
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl1_dvFeature" class="feature" style="overflow: hidden" fileurl="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-02.jpg">
                        <div style="position: absolute;">
                            <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl1_dvVideoContainer" class="videoContainer">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <p id="topTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouseltop&quot;&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When you choose a Board Certified surgeon, you can &lt;br /&gt;
count on quality care for you and those you love.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <p id="bottomTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouselbottom&quot;&gt;Research increasingly links Board Certification to tangible patient benefits such as better&lt;br /&gt;
clinical outcomes, fewer medical errors and improved communication.
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carousellink&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/about-board-certified-doctors/about-board-certification.aspx&quot;&gt;Learn more &amp;gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carouselfooter&quot;&gt;Certification Matters&amp;trade;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <img id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl1_imgItem" class="imageItem" src="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-02.jpg" border="0" />
                        
                    </div>
                
                    <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl2_dvFeature" class="feature" style="overflow: hidden" fileurl="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-01.jpg">
                        <div style="position: absolute;">
                            <div id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl2_dvVideoContainer" class="videoContainer">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <p id="topTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouseltop&quot;&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When your doctor is Board Certified by an ABMS &lt;br /&gt;
Member Board, quality care is the top priority.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <p id="bottomTextValue" style="display: none">
                            &lt;div class=&quot;carouselbottom&quot;&gt;&amp;ldquo;Medicine is different now than it was 10 or 20 years ago. We have to be accountable for the health care we are providing.&amp;rdquo;
Jamie L. Reedy, MD, MPH, Board Certified in Family Medicine
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carousellink&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/about-board-certified-doctors/the-doctors-perspective.aspx&quot;&gt;Learn more &amp;gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;carouselfooter&quot;&gt;Certification Matters&amp;trade;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
                        <img id="dnn_ctr1076_ViewCarousel_lvCarousel_ctrl2_imgItem" class="imageItem" src="/Portals/0/images/home-page-carousel-01.jpg" border="0" />
                        
                    </div>
                
                
        </div>
